970300.name: Re.poly
970300.description:
Important Early Access Notice Re.Poly is currently still in development. If you are expecting a fully finished and polished gameplay experience, you may want to wait before purchasing. 

Please only buy Re.Poly if you are aware that the game is in Early Access and that content, mechanics, and features may change over time.

As a player, you always have the opportunity to actively get involved by joining the official Discord server, where you can communicate directly with the developer, provide feedback, and help shape the future development of the game. You can find the Discord server link next to the other social media links or in the game’s main menu.

____________________________________________________

What is this game about?

____________________________________________________

Re.Poly is a relaxed yet deep indie survival game in a low-poly style that combines exploration, building, combat, and adventure. Whether playing alone or with friends, create your own world, write your own story, and decide for yourself how you want to play.

- Tend your fields, grow crops, and live off your own farming
- Freely design your house, decorate it, and color it to your liking
- Gather resources and craft both useful and decorative items
- Travel comfortably through a colorful world with mounts
- Play solo or together with friends, completely without pressure

____________________________________________________

What can you do?

____________________________________________________

Character Customization

- Customize your character
- Change gender, hair (including beards), hair color, eye color, and clothing color

____________________________________________________

Crafting

Gather resources and craft tools, equipment, and decorations. Crafting is a core element of Re.Poly and constantly unlocks new possibilities.

____________________________________________________

Economy and Farming

- Build your own farm and produce food to ensure your survival
- Buy animals from NPCs or capture them in the open world, breed them, and use their resources

____________________________________________________

Housing

- Build your own home from the ground up. Design it freely according to your vision, from a simple shelter to an impressive estate
- Decorate, color, expand it, and turn it into your personal retreat

____________________________________________________

Build Your Own Village (Still in Development)

- Rescue villagers and recruit them
- Assign them tasks such as gathering and hunting
- Villagers can help defend your village

____________________________________________________

Complete Quests

- Dive into a handcrafted world full of quests, characters, and secrets
- Help lost souls find peace by restoring their memories

____________________________________________________

Mounts and Movement

Travel faster and in style through the world of Re.Poly by discovering and capturing various mounts in the open world. They allow you to explore vast areas and uncover new locations. Your mounts are far more than simple rides: they serve as mobile homes, follow you as loyal companions, and actively support you in combat at your side.

____________________________________________________

Multiplayer: PvE & PvP

In multiplayer, the choice is yours: raid other players, defend your base and resources, or forge alliances to survive in the harsh world of Re.Poly. A simple guild system helps you manage your allies.

____________________________________________________

Why

- Lovingly crafted low-poly visuals
- Free gameplay without strict constraints
- Playable solo or in multiplayer
- Focus on creativity, building, and community
970300.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
